original_text: Now concerning the times and the seasons, brothers, you have no need to have anything written to you.
korean_text: 형제들아 때와 시기에 관하여는 너희에게 쓸 것이 없음은

sentences.original_text: Now concerning the times and the seasons
you have no need to have anything written to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게는 무엇을 써 줄 필요가 없습니다
